'+'
'+'We have a preexisting list already with a lot of contacts, but we are looking to expand upon it.
'+'
'+'Your job is to find as many writers as you possibly can who meet the following criteria -
'+'
'+'- writes on a site 45 DA or above (Must have MozBar to do this assignment)
'+'- the site they write for has to link out in their articles and link out with DOFOLLOW links (if it's nofollow its useless to us)

'+'

'+'- site name
'+'- name of writer
'+'- link of writer's author page or the author's most recent article
'+'- writer's email/contact info
'+'- link of where you found the writer's email/contact info
'+'
'+'The rate of the project is 15 cents per contact you find.'+'https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uTTLRuniAuqTLlouFVhRTGZzBVe-ZkBy3vGBUHA',availibity:'More than 30 hrs/week',term:'More than 6 months',type:'Ongoing project'}];return React.createElement("div",{className:"bgDashworker"},React.createElement(NavWorker,null),React.createElement(ContentWorking,{details:JobDetails}));};export default WorkSpace;

sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import DescriptionItem from "../component/DescriptionItem"; import './details.css' import NavWorker from "../component/NavWorker"; import ContentWorking from "../component/ContentWorking"; const WorkSpace = props =>{ const JobDetails = [ { id: 'pr01', title:'need someone to build upon preexisting list and find journalists in careers niche', description: 'Our goal is to collect the contact info of writers and journalists so that we can pitch them our resume studies for them to potentially write about.\n' + '\n' + 'We have a preexisting list already with a lot of contacts, but we are looking to expand upon it.\n' + '\n' + 'Your job is to find as many writers as you possibly can who meet the following criteria -\n' + '\n' + '- writes on a site 45 DA or above (Must have MozBar to do this assignment)\n' + '- the site they write for has to link out in their articles and link out with DOFOLLOW links (if it\'s nofollow its useless to us)\n' + '- writes on topics close enough where there\'s a chance of them potentially writing about our resume studies\n' + '- is currently writing for the blog (no outdated contacts)\n' + '- has some sort of contact info we can reach them at\n' + '- is not already on our list\n' + '\n' + 'for each entry you will include\n' + '- site name\n' + '- name of writer\n' + '- link of writer\'s author page or the author\'s most recent article\n' + '- writer\'s email/contact info\n' + '- link of where you found the writer\'s email/contact info\n' + '\n' + 'The rate of the project is 15 cents per contact you find.'+ 'https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uTTLRuniAuqTLlouFVhRTGZzBVe-ZkBy3vGBUHA', availibity: 'More than 30 hrs/week', term: 'More than 6 months', type: 'Ongoing project' } ]; return (
) } export default WorkSpace;
